meta.description: Background Scene Templates - 49 world locations and sky scenes for diverse dispatch missions

world_airport.name: World Airport Hub
world_airport.prompt_template: World Airport exterior, futuristic high-tech international airport hub, large colorful hangar buildings, tall control tower, multiple runways with markings, bright sunny day, clean modern architecture, Super Wings animated style, 3d rendered background, toy-like CGI aesthetic, vibrant cheerful colors, no characters, empty establishing shot, wide angle panoramic view, high quality render
world_airport.notes: Central hub location - bright and welcoming

hangar_interior.name: Hangar Interior
hangar_interior.prompt_template: Aircraft hangar interior, large open high-ceiling space, modern maintenance equipment and tools, bright overhead industrial lights, clean organized facility, Super Wings World Airport hangar style, high-tech control screens on walls, colorful and friendly atmosphere, 3d rendered interior background, toy-like CGI, no characters, establishing shot, high quality render

runway.name: Runway
runway.prompt_template: Airport runway scene, gray asphalt strip with white and yellow markings, runway lights along edges, control tower visible in background, World Airport buildings distant, ready for takeoff atmosphere, bright daylight, Super Wings animated style, 3d rendered background, toy-like CGI, no characters, ground level perspective, high quality render
